mapper.select: SELECT id, `name`, `position`, age, certificate, issuing_unit as issuingUnit, rich_text as richText, create_date as createDate FROM oa_quality_personnel WHERE `name` LIKE "%"#{name}"%"
SELECT id, `name`, `position`, age, certificate, issuing_unit as issuingUnit, rich_text as richText, create_date as createDate FROM oa_quality_personnel order by create_date desc
